projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features smooth animations, SEO optimization, and a clean design.

projects.name: E-Commerce API
projects.description: A RESTful e-commerce API built with Node.js and Express. Features user authentication, product management, order processing, and payment integration.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A full-stack task management application with real-time updates, user authentication, and collaborative features. Built with React and Firebase.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather dashboard that displays current weather and forecasts using OpenWeatherMap API. Features location-based weather data and interactive charts.

projects.name: Blog Platform
projects.description: A full-featured blog platform with markdown support, user authentication, and admin dashboard. Built with Next.js and Prisma.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: Real-time chat application with WebSocket support, user authentication, and file sharing capabilities. Built with Socket.io and React.

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.description: A URL shortening service with analytics, custom URLs, and QR code generation. Features click tracking and user dashboard.

projects.name: Recipe Finder
projects.description: A recipe discovery app that helps users find recipes based on available ingredients. Features search, filtering, and recipe sharing.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Personal finance management app with expense tracking, budget planning, and financial analytics. Features data visualization and export capabilities.

projects.name: Quiz App
projects.description: Interactive quiz application with multiple categories, scoring system, and leaderboard. Features timer, hints, and result sharing.

projects.name: Note Taking App
projects.description: A feature-rich note-taking application with markdown support, tags, search functionality, and cloud synchronization.

projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: A command-line password generator with customizable length, character types, and strength validation. Built with Python.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking mobile app with workout planning, progress tracking, and social features. Built with React Native.

projects.name: Food Delivery App
projects.description: A food delivery mobile application with real-time order tracking, payment integration, and restaurant management. Built with Flutter.

projects.name: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: An educational mobile app with video courses, quizzes, progress tracking, and offline learning capabilities. Built with React Native.

projects.name: Social Media App
projects.description: A social networking mobile app with real-time messaging, photo sharing, and user profiles. Built with Flutter and Firebase.

projects.name: TradeStats - Forex Trading Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive forex trading dashboard with real-time trading insights, performance analytics, and trade journal. Features live trades tracking, win rate analysis, and portfolio management tools.
